languages.text: {n}Губернатор закрывает глаза, не выдержав стыда и страха. На некоторых лицах в толпе читаются смятение и удивление, но куда больше других — тронутых тенью самодовольства и презрения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор закрывает глаза, лишь подчеркивая смесь стыда и страха. На некоторых лицах в толпе читаются смятение и удивление, но куда больше других — тронутых тенью самодовольства и презрения.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}The governor closes his eyes, fear and shame getting the better of him. Some faces in the crowd look confused and surprised, but you see more wearing expressions of self-satisfied contempt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор закрывает глаза, не выдержав стыда и страха. На некоторых лицах в толпе читаются смятение и удивление, но куда больше других — тронутых тенью самодовольства и презрения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Governor closes his eyes, caving in to fear and embarrassment. Some faces in the crowd are confused and surprised, but there are more of those who have the shadow of complacency and contempt cast on them.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Governor closes his eyes, caving in to fear and embarrassment. Some faces in the crowd are confused and surprised, but there are more of those who have the shadow of complacency and contempt cast on them.{/n}

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}総督は恐怖と羞恥に負けて目を閉じた。群衆の中には困惑や驚きの表情を浮かべる者もいるが、自己満足的な軽蔑の表情を浮かべる者の方が多いようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor closes his eyes, fear and shame getting the better of him. Some faces in the crowd look confused and surprised, but you see more wearing expressions of self-satisfied contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は恐怖と羞恥に負けて目を閉じた。群衆の中には困惑や驚きの表情を浮かべる者もいるが、自己満足的な軽蔑の表情を浮かべる者の方が多いようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}总督闭上双眼，陷入了恐惧与羞愧之中。人群中有人面露困惑与惊讶之色，但更多的人则一脸得意与轻蔑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor closes his eyes, fear and shame getting the better of him. Some faces in the crowd look confused and surprised, but you see more wearing expressions of self-satisfied contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}总督闭上双眼，陷入了恐惧与羞愧之中。人群中有人面露困惑与惊讶之色，但更多的人则一脸得意与轻蔑。{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur ferme les yeux, accablé par la peur et la honte. Bien que certains nobles semblent en proie à la plus grande confusion, bon nombre affichent une expression de mépris mâtinée de satisfaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor closes his eyes, fear and shame getting the better of him. Some faces in the crowd look confused and surprised, but you see more wearing expressions of self-satisfied contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur ferme les yeux, accablé par la peur et la honte. Bien que certains nobles semblent en proie à la plus grande confusion, bon nombre affichent une expression de mépris mâtinée de satisfaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}El gobernador cierra los ojos, dejando que el miedo y la vergüenza se apoderen de él. Entre el gentío hay algunos rostros confusos y sorprendidos, pero la mayoría de las expresiones son de desprecio y autosatisfacción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor closes his eyes, fear and shame getting the better of him. Some faces in the crowd look confused and surprised, but you see more wearing expressions of self-satisfied contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador cierra los ojos, dejando que el miedo y la vergüenza se apoderen de él. Entre el gentío hay algunos rostros confusos y sorprendidos, pero la mayoría de las expresiones son de desprecio y autosatisfacción.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur schließt die Augen und wird von Furcht und Scham überwältigt. Einige Gesichter in der Menge wirken verwirrt und überrascht, aber der Großteil der Anwesenden strahlt eine selbstzufriedene Geringschätzung aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor closes his eyes, fear and shame getting the better of him. Some faces in the crowd look confused and surprised, but you see more wearing expressions of self-satisfied contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur schließt die Augen, gibt seiner Furcht und Scham nach. Einige Gesichter in der Menge wirken verwirrt und überrascht, doch auf weitaus mehr Mienen ist der Schatten von Selbstgefälligkeit und Verachtung zu sehen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Vali, korku ve utancın pençesine düşerek gözlerini kapatıyor. Kalabalıktaki bazı yüzler şaşkın, çoğuysa memnun bir hâlde failleri ayıplıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor closes his eyes, fear and shame getting the better of him. Some faces in the crowd look confused and surprised, but you see more wearing expressions of self-satisfied contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, korku ve utancın pençesine kapılarak gözlerini kapatıyor. Kalabalıktaki bazı yüzler şaşkın, çoğuysa memnun bir hâlde failleri ayıplıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
